page.title: 16Weymouth Boys Club.
page.content: The{Boys Club on Chickerell Road}is {very poular with young people}because there is a lot going on there. On Mondays,Wednesdays and Thursdays you can play{pool,snooker,darts,table {tennis,football}and sometimes you can {trampoline. Disco Dancing}is held on {Wednesday night from 6.30-8.30pm.}and you can learn dances for competitions and cabarets. There is a{disco}on Fridays.{Judo}is on a Tuesday night from 6.30-9pm. The normal price to get in is 20p on most days but 30p on Friday. If you{pay a membership fee}of Â£1 the price is 10p or 15p on Friday. At the Boys Club they put up posters which tell you about Competitions that are going to be held. Although it is called{Boys Club girls go as well. -Susan Jowett.
